solution_line_template: Vanessa needs ${dress_cost} - ${initial_savings} = $<<{dress_cost}-{initial_savings}={money_needed}>>{money_needed} to buy the dress.
She manages to gather ${weekly_allowance} - ${weekly_spending} = $<<{weekly_allowance}-{weekly_spending}={net_weekly_gain}>>{net_weekly_gain} each week
The number of weeks she has to wait is {money_needed} / {net_weekly_gain} = <<{money_needed}/{net_weekly_gain}={weeks_to_wait}>>{weeks_to_wait} weeks.
